text:
Jewels and cash were stolen from the house of Sethu an ex serviceman near Kannamangalam.

Sethu who works as a security guard at Otteri water pumping station of Vellore municipality. left home by 11 a.m. on Saturday. Earlier his wife Anjalai left for MGNREGS work in the village. When the woman returned home to have lunch she was shocked to see the front door broken open.

The thieves had decamped with Rs.70,000 cash and seven-and-a-half sovereigns of gold jewels kept in the bureau.
title: Jewels, cash stolen
